channel.title: Dave Winer's linkblog
channel.description: This has been in existence in one form or another for many years. Now it's being edited in FeedLand using a bookmarklet.

item.description: "Once a woman became pregnant for any reason, she would now become the property of the state of South Carolina," said SC state senator Katrina Shealy, a Republican.

item.description: A nice thing about Bluesky is that everyone has about the same small number of followers, which suggests that perhaps follower count should not be in the UI. Wondering what other features turn up the heat too much and should be similarly treated.
item.source:markdown: A nice thing about Bluesky is that everyone has about the same small number of followers, which suggests that perhaps follower count should not be in the UI. Wondering what other features turn up the heat too much and should be similarly treated.

item.description: It might not be possible to de-Nazify social nets like Twitter, Mastodon or Bluesky -- yet that seems to be what users want.
item.source:markdown: It might not be possible to de-Nazify social nets like Twitter, Mastodon or Bluesky -- yet that seems to be what users want.

item.description: WordPress first shipped 20 years ago today. Thanks for keeping the blogging flame going, and thanks for supporting RSS and the open web. üòÄ
item.source:markdown: WordPress first shipped 20 years ago today. Thanks for keeping the blogging flame going, and thanks for supporting RSS and the open web. üòÄ

item.description: This is what a linkblog looked like in 2011. Remarkable how no progress has been made in all this time. We were pretty much blocked in every direction.
item.source:markdown: This is what a linkblog looked like in 2011\. Remarkable how no progress has been made in all this time. We were pretty much blocked in every direction.

item.description: We're going to have to figure out moderation for ourselves. Waiting for the tech companies to figure this out -- they are very limited as we have learned.
item.source:markdown: We're going to have to figure out moderation for ourselves. Waiting for the tech companies to figure this out -- they are very limited as we have learned.

item.description: A house for sale on the Hudson River. Thought people reading my linkblog might find this interesting. üòÄ

item.description: Pretty sure I can say how default will play out. A run on every bank in the world at the same time when we all realize that the US govt can't guarantee our deposits. Will happen well before June 1.
item.source:markdown: Pretty sure I can say how default will play out. A run on every bank in the world at the same time when we all realize that the US govt can't guarantee our deposits. Will happen well before June 1.

item.description: YouTube is planning to support inbound RSS for podcasts, but apparently will not pass through the feed, in other words you'll have to use YT's user interface to listen to podcasts.
item.source:markdown: YouTube is planning to support inbound RSS for podcasts, but apparently will not pass through the feed, in other words you'll have to use YT's user interface to listen to podcasts.

item.description: Tina Turner, the earthshaking soul singer whose rasping vocals, sexual magnetism and explosive energy made her an unforgettable live performer and one of the most successful recording artists of all time, died on Wednesday at her home in K√ºsnacht, Switzerland, near Zurich. She was 83.

She was 83.

item.description: Before Twitter blew up the devs, I used to from time to time put great art on the home page of my blog. Tech is like banks. When one fails, lots of other failures follow. It's inevitable when you depend on corporate APIs.
item.source:markdown: Before Twitter blew up the devs, I used to from time to time put great art on the home page of my blog. Tech is like banks. When one fails, lots of other failures follow. It's inevitable when you depend on corporate APIs.

item.description: Chief Justice Roberts in Supreme Court ethics pledge says he's "committed" to standards. #fascist
item.source:markdown: Chief Justice Roberts in Supreme Court ethics pledge says he's "committed" to standards. #fascist

item.description: Now that we have RSS feeds and OPML subscription lists for Bluesky, today I start developing applications that use that data. It's the first social network to have this feature.
item.source:markdown: Now that we have RSS feeds and OPML subscription lists for Bluesky, today I start developing applications that use that data. It's the first social network to have this feature.

item.description: I decided to pay Twitter a year in advance for the blue checkmark and whatever other privileges come with it. It's not that much money. I pay as much to Hulu or Apple TV. Is it worth it? I can afford to find out.
item.source:markdown: I decided to pay Twitter a year in advance for the blue checkmark and whatever other privileges come with it. It's not that much money. I pay as much to Hulu or Apple TV. Is it worth it? I can afford to find out.
